tool.name: GSAS2 BBO Refinement
tool.command: cd /app && ln -s $cif_file tmp.cif && ln -s $prm_file tmp.prm && touch $output && python -m gsas2_bbo_refinement.main --cif-filename tmp.cif --gsas-filename $gsas_file --instrument-params-filename tmp.prm --xmin $xmin --xmax $xmax #if $bankIDs: --banks #for $bank in $bankIDs: #set $bankID = str($bank["bank"]) $bankID #end for #end if --random-seed $random_seed --number-of-startup-trials $number_of_startup_trials --number-of-trials $number_of_trials --number-of-jobs $number_of_jobs --output-directory ./portal > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2)

param.name: use_iso
param.label: Use Uiso in BBO refinement parameters

param.name: number_of_startup_trials
param.label: Number of startup trials for BBO

param.name: number_of_jobs
param.label: Number of parallel jobs for BBO

tool.help: Runs a black box optimized (BBO) GSAS2 Rietveld refinement.
